verses.verse: Listen, <S%H8085><s%> O <S%H339>isles,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; and <S%H7181>hearken,<s%> ye <S%H3816>people,<s%> from <S%H4480>far;<s%> <S%H7350><s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7121>called<s%> me from the <S%H4480>womb;<s%> <S%H990><s%> from the <S%H4480>bowels<s%> <S%H4578><s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%> hath he made <S%H2142>mention<s%> of my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> like a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath he <S%H2244>hid<s%> me, and <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1305>polished<s%> <S%H2671>shaft;<s%> in his <S%H827>quiver<s%> hath he <S%H5641>hid<s%> me;
And <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> I will be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

Then <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H3021>labored<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> I have <S%H3615>spent<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> for <S%H8414>naught,<s%> and in <S%H1892>vain:<s%> yet <S%H403>surely<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and my <S%H6468>work<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> me from the <S%H4480>womb<s%> <S%H990><s%> to be his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> to bring Jacob <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H3290><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, Though <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be not <S%H622>gathered,<s%> yet shall I be <S%H3513>glorious<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and my <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5797>strength.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H4480>be<s%> <S%H1961><s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H5341>preserved<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his Holy <S%H6918>One,<s%> to him whom <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H960>despiseth,<s%> to him whom the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H8581>abhorreth,<s%> to a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers,<s%> <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> also shall <S%H7812>worship,<s%> because <S%H4616>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> thee.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> have I <S%H6030>heard<s%> thee, and in a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> have I <S%H5826>helped<s%> thee: and I will <S%H5341>preserve<s%> thee, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to cause to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5159>heritages;<s%>

That thou mayest <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H631>prisoners,<s%> Go <S%H3318>forth;<s%> to them <S%H834>that<s%> are in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> Show <S%H1540>yourselves.<s%> They shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and their <S%H4830>pastures<s%> shall be in <S%H3605>all<s%> high <S%H8205>places.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7456>hunger<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6770>thirst;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H8273>heat<s%> nor <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> he that hath <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> them, even <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> shall he <S%H5095>guide<s%> them.
And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and my <S%H4546>highways<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4480>far:<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> from the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and from the <S%H4480>west;<s%> <S%H3220><s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H5515>Sinim.<s%>

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and be <S%H1523>joyful,<s%> O <S%H776>earth;<s%> and break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> O <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon his <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
But <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and my <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me.

Can a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her sucking <S%H5764>child,<s%> that she should not have <S%H4480>compassion<s%> <S%H7355><s%> on the <S%H1121>son<s%> of her <S%H990>womb?<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H428>they<s%> may <S%H7911>forget,<s%> yet will <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thee.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I have <S%H2710>graven<s%> thee <S%H5921>upon<s%> the palms of my <S%H3709>hands;<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> are <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
Thy <S%H1121>children<s%> shall make <S%H4116>haste;<s%> thy <S%H2040>destroyers<s%> and they that made thee <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these gather themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to thee. As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H3847>clothe<s%> thee with them <S%H3605>all,<s%> as with an <S%H5716>ornament,<s%> and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them on thee, as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> doeth.

For <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H2723>waste<s%> and thy desolate <S%H8074>places,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H2035>destruction,<s%> shall <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> be too <S%H3334>narrow<s%> by reason of the <S%H4480>inhabitants,<s%> <S%H3427><s%> and they that swallowed thee <S%H1104>up<s%> shall be far <S%H7368>away.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> which thou shalt have, after thou hast lost the <S%H7923>other,<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in thine <S%H241>ears,<s%> The <S%H4725>place<s%> is too <S%H6862>strait<s%> for me: give <S%H5066>place<s%> to me that I may <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> hath <S%H3205>begotten<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> seeing <S%H589>I<s%> have lost my <S%H7909>children,<s%> and am <S%H1565>desolate,<s%> a <S%H1540>captive,<s%> and removing to and <S%H5493>fro?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> hath brought <S%H1431>up<s%> <S%H428>these?<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> <S%H375>where<s%> had <S%H1992>they<s%> been?

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and set <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H5251>standard<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> in their <S%H2684>arms,<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy nursing <S%H539>fathers,<s%> and their <S%H8282>queens<s%> thy nursing <S%H3243>mothers:<s%> they shall bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to thee with their <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and lick <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for <S%H834>they<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me.
Shall the <S%H4455>prey<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H4480>mighty,<s%> <S%H1368><s%> <S%H518>or<s%> the <S%H6662>lawful<s%> <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H4422>delivered?<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall be taken <S%H3947>away,<s%> and the <S%H4455>prey<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered:<s%> for <S%H595>I<s%> will contend <S%H7378>with<s%> him that contendeth <S%H3401>with<s%> thee, and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> thy <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And I will <S%H398>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> them that <S%H3238>oppress<s%> thee <S%H853>with<s%> their own <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and they shall be <S%H7937>drunken<s%> with their own <S%H1818>blood,<s%> as with sweet <S%H6071>wine:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am thy <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
